name: Vuebit
author: info@vuebit.com

sections.description: Vuebit automatically creates gif-like previews for every youtube video on your site. It also supports vimeo, dailymotion and streamable embedded videos. This plugin loads vuebit.js in your pages.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly or upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/vuebit directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. No more actions are required. The script will be added in every page of your blog.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly or upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/vuebit directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. No more actions are required. The script will be added in every page of your blog.

Do I need a subscription with vuebit.com ?

Yes. In order to use this plugin you need to have an active subscription to one of vuebit’s monthly plans.
Visit https://vuebit.com for more details.

Does vuebit support only youtube videos ?

No. Vuebit can create previews for vimeo, dailymotion and streamable as well.

short_description: Enables gif-like previews for every youtube video on your site.
description: Vuebit automatically creates gif-like previews for every youtube video on your site. It also supports vimeo, dailymotion and streamable embedded videos. This plugin loads vuebit.js in your pages.
